Our engineers work with billions of rows of set top box data, descriptive models from the data science team, and a stack that includes Redshift, Hadoop, Spark, Java, and lots more. We enjoy great benefits, great 13th-story views, and work-from-home Fridays.

We grew out of the Obama Campaign, where we used big, individual-level data to buy ads in a more cost-effective way than ever before. We're bringing this methodology (and scrappiness!) to a broad array of clients, ranging from Fortune 500 consumer companies to political candidates and interest groups.
